data.name: Hell Let Loose – Upper Echelon
data.detailed_description:
Unlock access to join the Upper Echelon and take command of the front lines with these unique uniforms for the Commander Role. Show off your rank and station with the "Field Blue Heer Officer" uniform for the German forces or stride out in your "Summer Service" uniform for the US.

Upper Echelon pack contains

German Forces - "Field Blue Heer Officer" Uniform for the Commander role

US Forces - "Summer Service" Uniform for the Commander role and the M1 Major Helmet
data.about_the_game:
Unlock access to join the Upper Echelon and take command of the front lines with these unique uniforms for the Commander Role. Show off your rank and station with the "Field Blue Heer Officer" uniform for the German forces or stride out in your "Summer Service" uniform for the US.

Upper Echelon pack contains

data.short_description: Unlock access to join the Upper Echelon and take command of the front lines with these unique uniforms for the Commander Role. Show off your rank and station with the "Field Blue Heer Officer" uniform for the German forces or stride out in your "Summer Service" uniform for the US.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600/AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB /AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features mature content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

Realistic depictions of War, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
